original_title: Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol
overview: In this animated documentary, Los Angeles filmmaker Dion Labriola recounts his all-consuming childhood quest to contact his teen idol, Ike Eisenmann - and the magical turn of events that led him toward his goal (some 40 years later).
tagline: A dream come true...forty years in the making.
title: Dear Ike: Lost Letters to a Teen Idol
